rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 3 life and create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
rules_text2:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Charcuterie Fantastique: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Charcuterie Fantastique, you may exile it. If you do, at the beginning of the next end step, return to the battlefield target artifact or creature card in your graveyard with mana value less than or equal to the amount of life you’ve gained this turn or the amount of life you’ve lost this turn, whichever is greater. [i](Damage causes loss of life.)[/i]
notes:
Added art, added flavor text, changed back name to be more appealing (given it’s a contest dish and he’s supposed to be a competent chef)
+Legendary backside
Reworked backside — moved original effect to Signature Creations File
